RT @TamesideCouncil: *** FLOOD ALERT ***

The Environment Agency @EnvAgencyNW have issued a ‘Flooding is possible - be prepared’ alert for…

Working in the Insurance game for two decades, I know about flooding, and the costs.

Two recent peaks at Northenden, but ground still quite heavily saturated, will not take much for rivers to quickly build.

Keep an eye on @EnvAgency and @EnvAgencyNW for Gtr Mcr for updates. https://t.co/fpdLHaJhCM https://t.co/yZ03wwmP0r

A serious situation - river levels on the Derwent could well threaten levels we saw in November 2019. Heed @EnvAgency & @metoffice warnings over the next few days. #StormChristoph https://t.co/L2xl8s4lgN https://t.co/A0J7OrSbJo
